title: Treasure Magnet
summaries: The Treasure Magnet is an accessory which increases the pickup range of items from 2.625 tiles to 12 tiles while equipped. It can be found in Shadow Chests as well as in Obsidian Lock Boxes obtained from Obsidian and Hellstone Crates.
When an item is within its range, before directly flying to the player, it will hover a few blocks off the ground.

statistics.Sell: 5
